translation.it: Signore e signori, restate seduti con le cinture allacciate.

translation.en: [Duncan] Thank you, Marcus. Now, for our final order of business,
translation.it: Grazie, Marcus. Come ultimo ordine del giorno,

translation.en: I'd like to discuss a particularly noteworthy development
translation.it: vorrei discutere di una crescita degna di nota

translation.en: from the lab team over at ESA. Mary, would you please show--
translation.it: del team di laboratorio ESA. - Mary, potresti mostrare… - Mi scusi, signore.

translation.en: [Mary] I'm sorry, sir. I'm afraid there's someone--
translation.it: - Mary, potresti mostrare… - Mi scusi, signore. Temo che ci sia qualcuno…

translation.en: -[woman] Excuse me? -G'day.
translation.it: Temo che ci sia qualcuno… Ehilà.

translation.en: -Hi, Will. -Dana.
I'm sorry, who are you?
What are you doing here?
I didn't think I'd ever see you again.
translation.it: Non credevo che ti avrei rivista.

translation.en: Well, I need to speak to your old man.
William, what is the meaning of this? Who is this woman?
translation.it: William, che succede? Chi è questa donna?

translation.en: Mr. Mitchell. Hi.
Uh, ladies and gentlemen of the board…
Yep. Well, my name is Dana Randall.
translation.it: Sì, beh, io sono Dana Randall.

translation.en: I'm the chief pilot at Fullerton Airways, a small Australian airline,
translation.it: Primo pilota della Fullerton Airways, una piccola compagnia aerea australiana

translation.en: which you terminated a few days ago.
translation.it: che avete chiuso qualche giorno fa.

translation.en: William, sit down.
Yeah.
[Duncan] Miss Randall, this is highly irregular.
translation.it: Sig.na Randall, tutto ciò è irregolare.

translation.en: -You'll need to leave. -If you give me five minutes--
translation.it: - Deve andarsene. - Mi dia cinque minuti…

translation.en: -Mary, will you please call-- -Dad, Dad.
Let's hear her out.
Two minutes.
This had better be good.
Well, Fullerton Airways is a tiny operation
translation.it: La Fullerton Airways è una piccola compagnia

translation.en: on the other side of the world.
But what you won't believe
is that we actually have something in common.
You see, we're both family businesses.
translation.it: Siamo entrambe aziende a conduzione familiare.

translation.en: My mum and dad started ours when I was little and,
translation.it: I miei avviarono la nostra quando ero piccola

translation.en: well, I promised myself that I would always protect it,
translation.it: e io mi sono ripromessa di proteggerla

translation.en: always keep it just the way that they made it.
The way that I always remembered it.
You know what happened? I killed it.
I think it might be better--
I killed it because I didn't want anything to change.
translation.it: L'ho affossata perché non volevo cambiare nulla.

translation.en: You know, and sometimes we do need to accept
that the best way forward is to chart a different course.
translation.it: che il modo migliore per andare avanti è cambiare rotta.

translation.en: Look I came here today with a proposal.
translation.it: Oggi sono qui con una proposta.

translation.en: We cannot stand still any longer.
translation.it: Non possiamo continuare a stare fermi.

translation.en: The only way for Fullerton Airways to survive is to expand.
translation.it: La Fullerton Airways può sopravvivere solo espandendosi.

translation.en: We need to bring in more pilots, more planes.
Here you go. This is yours. It's time to take the next step.
translation.it: Ecco. Questo è suo. Passeremo alla fase successiva.

translation.en: In order to do that, we are going to need a new injection of capital.
translation.it: E, per farlo, ci servirà del nuovo capitale.

translation.en: Now, with your support, we'll be able to increase the coverage,
translation.it: Col vostro sostegno, potremo aumentare la copertura

translation.en: almost triple the output within two years.
translation.it: e triplicare i rendimenti in due anni.

translation.en: We can take Fullerton Airways
from a struggling family operation to a thriving business,
translation.it: passerà da azienda di famiglia in difficoltà ad attività fiorente

translation.en: one that continues to serve the community in meaningful and essential ways.
translation.it: in grado di aiutare la comunità in modo essenziale e significativo.

translation.en: So, I mean, what do you think?
I think this has gone on long enough.
translation.it: Penso che sia ora di finirla.

translation.en: Miss Randall, this is absurd. I'm familiar with your situation.
translation.it: Sig.na Randall, tutto questo è assurdo. Conosco la vostra situazione.

translation.en: Do you honestly expect us to throw more money into this disaster?
translation.it: Si aspetta davvero che finanzieremo un simile disastro?

translation.en: There's no indication you'll be able to manage something like this.
translation.it: Non ci sono segni che possiate gestire una cosa simile.

translation.en: What if they had a more experienced financial officer?
translation.it: E con un consulente finanziario più preparato?

translation.en: What?
Dad…
I'm resigning. Effective immediately.
I, uh… I'm gonna go and work for Fullerton Airways.
If they'll have me.
You must be joking.
No, I'm… I'm not.
But if you give me a chance to get this business on their feet,
translation.it: Ma se mi permetterai di rimettere in piedi quest'azienda

translation.en: I will show you that they do have legs.
Don't be ridiculous.
I mean, why in heaven's name would you want to throw away a career?
translation.it: Perché mai vuoi gettare via la tua carriera?

translation.en: Dad, you built this business. This was your dream.
translation.it: Papà, hai costruito quest'azienda. Era il tuo sogno.

translation.en: Don't you remember how that felt?
To believe in something so badly that you had to see it done?
translation.it: A credere in un progetto così tanto da volerlo realizzare?

translation.en: But, William--
Look, I… I only came here because I wanted to make you proud.
translation.it: - Ma, William… - Ascolta, io sono qui perché volevo renderti fiero di me.

translation.en: I still want that.
But I… I don't belong here.
translation.it: Ma questo posto non fa per me.

translation.en: I'm just asking you to trust me.
translation.it: Ti chiedo solo di fidarti di me.

translation.en: Trust us.
Please.
You really think you can do this?
We can.
Together.
-Mary. -Yes, sir?
Send in Simon and the legal team. We have a proposal to review.
translation.it: Chiama Simon e i legali. Dobbiamo valutare una proposta.

translation.en: Shall we?
You sure about this? I mean, it's not going to be easy.
translation.it: Ne sei sicuro? Non sarà facile.

translation.en: Well, are you sure you want to have a flying partner?
translation.it: Tu sei sicura di volere un compagno di volo?

translation.en: Something like that.
